name: John Wick: Red Circle
detailed_description: The Red Circle is a multi-leveled New York Russian nightclub packed full of gangsters and guns. Get an in-depth look at John Wick’s most intricate & intensive action sequence.
about_the_game: The Red Circle is a multi-leveled New York Russian nightclub packed full of gangsters and guns. Get an in-depth look at John Wick’s most intricate & intensive action sequence.
